### Example Configuration File


An example of a configuration file is shown here:

````
[chatbot]
bot_id = 5051

[api]
endpoint=c0.avaamo.com
api_key=ec3d1f2cf5094f48b9be853bbc1aa9fc
dashboard_access_token=7358b733270342559cb736b04a80c490

[cookies]
dashboard_access_--b96eaee4007ddafa120ddfe377e44589495520ef
remember_dashboard_user_token=W1s0ODddLCJMTHREN21IZnVXZjJNdXBVc1VFYSIsIjE1NTI0MTU3MjIuNDcxMDM2Il0%%3D--b9deb4018b13379cc6936152200df450f7a148ee

````

Environment variables are used to pass the credentials to the CLIs or the python process using the APIs.

````
export AVAAMO_ENDPOINT=c0.avaamo.com
export AVAAMO_API_KEY=7c4e2809ecbf44b8bdabcb6fb85b3bae
````
